content:
March 21 , 20,00
The New Elected President of Vice President.
of ROC - Mr. Chen Sui Bran & Mrs annelle Lu Taipei Taiwan
Dear Mr. President & Mrs Vice President Ms. /Mrs.
Herety I'm wishing you, my congratulate- ions as the New elected President of Vice President of ROC.祝您 恭禧。
Meanwhile, I should like to have some illustrated books on ROC .-
〈建議)
Further more, I should like to proposer You Chinese language with Latin alpha- beth as the new language of China- For instance: 許躍蕭 CHUNG I HUA E MINE KWO, Am awaiting your early reply with much interest, I remain with the kind- est regards,希望可能收到您的 答来信。謝您。請您答來關於我的 Respect fully, 建議·中文用LATIN字母
Emkshi-李光瑞敬賀 E. M.K.S. LI
P.O. BOX 13598 郵政信箱 2501 EN DEN HAAG V & HOLLAND 荷蘭
國史馆 Academia Historica

paragraphs.content: The New Elected President of Vice President.
of ROC - Mr. Chen Sui Bran & Mrs annelle Lu Taipei Taiwan
Dear Mr. President & Mrs Vice President Ms. /Mrs.
Herety I'm wishing you, my congratulate- ions as the New elected President of Vice President of ROC.祝您 恭禧。
Meanwhile, I should like to have some illustrated books on ROC .-

Further more, I should like to proposer You Chinese language with Latin alpha- beth as the new language of China- For instance: 許躍蕭 CHUNG I HUA E MINE KWO, Am awaiting your early reply with much interest, I remain with the kind- est regards,希望可能收到您的 答来信。謝您。請您答來關於我的 Respect fully, 建議·中文用LATIN字母
